ygData.subject: This would help a bit...
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, i feel that warriors should have a sleeping ability, but not to the extent that all goes black.  It should be just like medditate,  exit when you
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, i feel that warriors should have a sleeping ability, but not to the extent that all goes black. It should be just like medditate, exit when you want, and you can still type, just you can't see what is going on. So, a mediate for warriors is the one thing that will help a lot, well thats what i think. It just takes me too long to get back all that health...

Dubas of the 17th rank
~Mithaniel Marr~
